fqdn.description: The FQDN to be blocked (for ex: 'example.domain.com').

associated-interface.description: The associated interface of the firewall leave blank for 'Any' (default: Any).

comment.description: A commentary to be displayed in the Fortigate GUI (default none).

description: Add a new FQDN object to a Fortigate Firewall
name: Post Fortigate FQDN Address
